Text: ...Alpha...Alpha...
(Who's there...? Is someone calling out to me...?)
Mmm...?

Ah, awake at last. I've been trying to wake you up
for ages.
You're—
...Zeta?
(This is...a classroom...)

You were out cold, so I wasn't sure what to do. We're
supposed to talk strategy with Nuru today, right?
Huh? Nuru...?

Yeah, that weird little creature who yaps a lot.
I know it's been a while since you saw him, but don't
tell me you forgot the little guy? I feel kinda bad
for him now.

...Oh yeah, I remember now. I suppose that wasn't
very kind of me.

Eh, I'm sure it's fine. I guess he is kinda
forgettable, anyway.

But it still wouldn't be good to keep him waiting.
Okay, Alpha, let's get moving!
Wait, isn't it time for cla—
Huh? But they let school out early today.
They did? Why?

Seems a group of teachers and students all started
feeling sick, so they ended classes right away.
I mean, just look around. No one's here, right?

...Now that you mention it, you're right.
Everyone's gone...
Alpha, did you seriously sleep through it all?
It...seems I did. Thanks for waking me up.

No sweat, that's what friends are for. And I didn't
want to see you get in trouble, either.

Good point... All the good grades in the world
wouldn't save me from a scolding if I nodded off.

Hmm, that is true. But this kind of thing has been
happening on and off lately, so the school is a bit
on edge. That's probably why they get angry if
people stick around instead of leaving.
...Makes sense.
Yep. So, shall we get a move on?

Yeah. Both Nuru and the school will be upset with
us if we stick around here much longer.

...That's funny. This is where we were supposed to
meet...but I don't see hide nor hair of him.
Yeah... Are we sure he isn't inside a dumpster again?
Heheh... Knowing him, it's certainly possible—
Long time no see, you two!
Ack!

Nuru... Did you really have to jump out and scare
us like that?
Sorry 'bout that. I was just so happy to see ya.

I think it's been around two weeks since that day,
the day we took out the evil spirit. How've you
been?

Hanging in there, I guess, considering there's
some bug going around.

Huh, like a cold or something? Doesn't have anything
to do with evil spirits, though. How about you, Alpha?
...Oh, good enough, I suppose.
Good! Sometimes good enough is best!

Anyway, have you found anything oozing with youthful
delusions...by which I mean Dark Histories? How about
run-ins with evil spirits?

Nope. Everything's been so normal, that one day
seems like a dream. You sure these Dark History
things actually exist?

Yeah, because they give off sinister auras. You guys
would know one if you saw it.

Darkollector isn't picking anything up... But if it
does, I assume that means fighting another evil
spirit?

Pretty much. Young people in the throes of adolescence
have no end of worries. That means Dark Histories will
continue to be created.

You mentioned that possibility of even more massive
evil spirits appearing...so I am a little concerned.

Same here. We were wrecked after fighting that last
one... If anything bigger comes along we might be in
real trouble.

Exactly. I really do think we need to boost our
combat abilities.

And we're also going to need allies to gather the
"Bones" that appear when a Dark History is
destroyed.

Bingo. Like you said before, the first thing we need
is more people.

But the more people we have, the bigger this
operation is gonna get... Won't we also need
some kinda base to act as cover?

That's true... But we can think about a base in due
time.

So recruiting comes first. What about that person
you mentioned before, Nuru?
...I mentioned someone?

You did. Some co-developer of Darkollector or
something. The timing is perfect, so make the intro.
Hmm... Oh, right...
Uh... What's that reaction?

...Oh, it's nothing. I'll reach out to set up a
meeting.

Anyway, now that we got our gameplan decided,
let's call it here for today, huh?

Okay. Well, my house is this way, so I'll see you
guys later!
Yeah, see you tomorrow.
Get home safe!
(See you later, eh...)
Uh, Alpha? Something wrong?
...Huh? Did I seem off?

You were just staring at Zeta, so just thought
I'd ask.

Oh... I was just a little sad she had to go.I'm glad
I'll get to see her again, but I was hoping we
could've hung out just a little longer.

That's what we call having a friend, Alpha. And
someday she'll probably become even more
irreplaceable to you.

Heehee, no need to overstate it. I hope it goes the
same with this person you're going to introduce.
Um, about that...
Again with that reaction...?

I mean, c'mon... I can't go making false promises.
She doesn't strike me as the type to join up so
easily.
Is she really that difficult of a person?
Well, you'll see when you meet her...

(I get what Nuru is saying...but I wonder what
she's really like.)
